languages.text: "Один удар, не во славу и не по воле Его, а лишь для себя... Будет ли это таким тяжким грехом?.. Нет, я не должна так думать".
"Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."
languages.original_text: "Один удар, не во славу и не по воле Его, а лишь для себя... Будет ли это таким тяжким грехом?.. Нет, я не должна так думать".

traits.locale_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."
"Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."
"Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

"Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

languages.text: «Solo un golpe. No en Su nombre, no por Su voluntad. ¿Sería muy grave la transgresión? No, debo desterrar esas ideas».
languages.original_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: «Solo un golpe. No en Su nombre, no por Su voluntad. ¿Sería muy grave la transgresión? No, debo desterrar esas ideas».

languages.text: 「ただ一撃。主の名においてではなく、主の意志でもなく、ただ自分のために。それは重大な不法行為でしょうか？いいえ、そんな考えは捨てるべきなのです」
languages.original_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ一撃。主の名においてではなく、主の意志でもなく、ただ自分のために。それは重大な不法行為でしょうか？いいえ、そんな考えは捨てるべきなのです」

languages.text: “只要一击就好。不是以祂的名义，也不是出于祂的意愿——完全是为了我自己考虑。不知道这算不算是严重的叛教行为？噢，不行，我必须打消这样的念头。”
languages.original_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: “只要一击就好。不是以祂的名义，也不是出于祂的意愿——完全是为了我自己考虑。不知道这算不算是严重的叛教行为？噢，不行，我必须打消这样的念头。”

languages.text: "Nur ein Hieb. Nicht in Seinem Namen, nicht nach Seinem Willen – nur für mich selbst. Ob das wohl ein schweres Vergehen wäre? Nein, solche Gedanken muss ich verbannen."
languages.original_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein Hieb. Nicht in Seinem Namen, nicht nach Seinem Willen – nur für mich selbst. Ob das wohl ein schweres Vergehen wäre? Nein, solche Gedanken muss ich verbannen."

languages.text: « Juste un coup, un seul. Pas en Son nom, ni par Sa volonté... mais rien que pour moi. Me rendrais-je ce faisant coupable d'une grave transgression ? Non, je ne devrais même pas y songer. »
languages.original_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: « Juste un coup, un seul. Pas en Son nom, ni par Sa volonté... mais rien que pour moi. Me rendrais-je ce faisant coupable d'une grave transgression ? Non, je ne devrais même pas y songer. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca tek bir darbe. O'nun adını da O'nun arzusunu da onurlandırmak için değil, yalnızca kendim için. Çok büyük bir günah mı olur diye merak ediyorum. Hayır, böylesi düşünceleri zihnimden kovmalıyım."
languages.original_text: "Just one strike. Not in His name, not by His will — merely for myself. Would it be a grave trespass, I wonder? No, I must banish such thoughts."
